## FAQs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24cc8fa5edfde775e7032_Vector.avif)
What services does AppX offer?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
AppX provides Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Creators, offering customized website and application development, maintenance and ongoing support.
Do I need technical expertise to use AppX services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
No, you don't need prior technical experience. Our team of professionals will handle the creation, maintenance and customization of your website and app for you.
How long does it take to create a website or application with AppX?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
It takes 3-5 days to deliver your finished application and website.
Can I request changes or updates to my website or app after it's live?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
Absolutely! AppX offers ongoing support and our team is available to make updates, additions or changes to your website or application as needed.
What kind of support is available after the website or app is launched?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
AppX offers ongoing support to address any issues, answer questions and make updates or improvements as your business evolves. Our support team is dedicated to ensuring your continued success.

## FAQs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24cc8fa5edfde775e7032_Vector.avif)
What services does AppX offer?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
AppX provides Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for Creators, offering customized website and application development, maintenance and ongoing support.
Do I need technical expertise to use AppX services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
No, you don't need prior technical experience. Our team of professionals will handle the creation, maintenance and customization of your website and app for you.
How long does it take to create a website or application with AppX?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
It takes 3-5 days to deliver your finished application and website.
Can I request changes or updates to my website or app after it's live?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
Absolutely! AppX offers ongoing support and our team is available to make updates, additions or changes to your website or application as needed.
What kind of support is available after the website or app is launched?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a21f6c73352e86a33fcd30/65a24e233a064c4ad425c17d_chevron-down.png)
AppX offers ongoing support to address any issues, answer questions and make updates or improvements as your business evolves. Our support team is dedicated to ensuring your continued success.

**AppX: Empowering Social Media Creators through Custom Apps**

Founded in 2020 and a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch S21, AppX is based in New Delhi, India. The core mission of AppX is simple yet powerful: to enable social media creators to launch their own mobile apps and websites, unlocking new opportunities to monetize their audiences through courses and premium content.

### What Does AppX Do?

AppX provides a robust Software as a Service (SaaS) platform tailored for creators. Here's what it offers:

1. **Website Builder** - No coding skills required. Creators can easily set up their personal websites.
2. **Mobile Applications** - Custom mobile app creation to engage audiences on the go.
3. **Course Management** - Tools for creators to design and sell courses seamlessly.
4. **Membership Communities** - Build rich user communities with tailored subscription plans.
5. **Marketing Tools** - Enhance visibility and engagement across platforms.
6. **Content Security** - Ensure that sensitive content is well-protected.
7. **Live Events and Webinars** - Facilitate smooth interactions with audiences through live broadcasts.

With a dedicated team of around 30 employees, AppX is not just about providing a tool—it's about creating a partnership with creators, helping them to transform their audience into thriving communities. 

### Numbers That Speak

AppX has already made a significant impact:

- Over **10,000 creators** using their services.
- Active in **150+ countries**.
- More than **6 crores user signups**.

These statistics underline not just a client base, but a globally engaged community of creators leveraging the platform.

### Client Testimonials

The feedback from creators is overwhelmingly positive. Here's a glimpse:

- **Sunil Nain** from BeWise Classes (400K+ followers) praises AppX for its quick response times and robust customer service.
- **Ankit Singh**, with 1M+ subscribers, appreciates the attentive support provided by the team during his year of using AppX.
- **Ashu Ghai**, who has 6M+ followers, highlights how easy it is to manage interactions with large student numbers thanks to AppX.

### Join the Revolution

Whether you're a seasoned creator or just starting, AppX offers an effortless way to establish your digital presence. Interested creators can easily schedule a demo to explore how AppX can tailor solutions to fit their unique needs.

To find out more, visit [AppX.co.in](https://appx.co.in) and kickstart your journey towards building your brand today.
